recipient.name: Kermit Olsen
recipient.address: W6/05- U.5. Hwy2, Cabin 2, Hermansville, Ns.Y9OF7

message.subject: Incentive Promotion Request
message.body: I may be lonelier, but very pleased with your incentive program. I used to make Marlboros, but now I'm considering Camels. My friend lives in a cabin next to me and I was wondering if you could send him a promotion letter so he also can benefit. Thank you.
